title: Fluffy Muffins for WhatsApp
description:
Transform your WhatsApp experience with Fluffy Muffins! This AI-powered browser enhances your communication, productivity, and learning, all while keeping the fun intact.

Why you’ll love it:
💬 Smart Replies: Craft perfect responses in any tone.
🧠 Instant Link Summaries: Get concise summaries of long articles.
🌍 Real-time Translation: Chat effortlessly in any language.
🔒 Privacy Control: Manage your data and ensure security.

It's free. Check it out and let us know what you think!
